paper.title: Combining instance-based and model-based learning

author.org: Basser Department of Computer Science, University of Sydney, Sydney Australia 2006, quinlan@cs.su.oz.au

paper.abstract: This paper concerns learning tasks that require the prediction of a continuous value rather than a discrete class. A general method is presented that allows predictions to use both instance-based and model-based learning.
